encodingDesc.p: This file uses ISO/IEC 5218 to encode the sex of the persons it describes to enhance data interoperability. The ISO/IEC 5218 standard has been criticized for being biased and out of date. Our use of this code is provisional and should not be construed as an endorsement of sexual binarism or priority.

This file uses ISO 3166-1 alpha 2 to encode nationality to enhance data interoperability. ISO 3166-1 may represent nationality in a way that reflects bias. Our use of this standard should not be construed as an endorsement of any political viewpoint.
